name: Skeleton Sweeper
description:
This is my entry for Halloween Jam.

I am also working on 2 other projects but since I'm probably not going to make it to the deadline with those I decided to make this small game to have something done.

If you've ever played Mine Sweeper you already know how to play this game.

No high scores and no difficulty levels though so don't expect the GOTY 2016.

Update: tweaked the difficulty a bit and made the props look a bit prettier
